body_html:
The PRId64 issues can be fixed by adding #include <inttypes.h> to the top of

pytorch/aten/src/ATen/templates/TypeDerived.cpp

Line 4 in 445cc1f

#define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS

For other errors, the compiler is right too, for some reason all these THByteTensor_zerosLike didn't get generated.

All this checked on master.
body_text:

         Line 4
      in
      445cc1f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           #define __STDC_FORMAT_MACROS 
        
    
  


For other errors, the compiler is right too, for some reason all these THByteTensor_zerosLike didn't get generated.
All this checked on master.
body:
The `PRId64` issues can be fixed by adding `#include <inttypes.h>` to the top of https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/445cc1f5b9a1647949c7b27b60e9800339f88db9/aten/src/ATen/templates/TypeDerived.cpp#L4

For other errors, the compiler is right too, for some reason all these `THByteTensor_zerosLike` didn't get generated.

All this checked on master.
